评论详情: I'm average height 5'6" and this sweater seems like it is made for someone a few inches shorter. Fabric also feels very synthetic. I will probably hand wash and hang dry to prevent shrinkage. Cute but not a very warm fabric either. Good luck finding the button holes too; it is a bit confusing.

I have 4 of these! Love them! So comfortable, good weight for fall - spring - just wear weather appropriate long sleeve t-shirt under.  I am 5'4" / 145 lbs and the large is perfect. I saw on some reviews that the people thought that there is only one button ---but look closer... I made the same assumption with my first one.  Always get compliments when I wear these!! Great with jeans, leggings, boots of any style. I have successfully machine washed in a lingerie bag, gentle cycle, cold water, air dry.

If you’re looking for a true or basic black sweater this isn’t it!!  Picture is comparing it to my black leggings.  The sweater is more a dark grey weave.Should have gone with a smaller size as the xl was bigger than I expected.

Read reviews about wrong color being received, but I took a chance anyways. I ordered screen shot but received the othere. I did order a size larger too per reviews. Overall fit was ok. Wish the sleeves were longer and I wish it would have fit more like a med on the body, too bulky for me. Material felt good it was cozy but just was not a fan of the color I received.  Maybe another color would work but I sent this one back.
This is a really nice sweater. I just received the wrong color.  The first picture is the one it says I bought…the second picture is the one they sent to me.

Her posture conceals the true cut and shape of this jacket sweater. In truth it is very odd. Partway between a double-breasted cardi and a wrap? Asymmetry is usually my thing but this just feels and looks, AWKWARD. Plus I think it's synthetic blend that should never know the touch of a dryer. Would not buy again.

Two Buttons, zero button holes. It is much thinner than I thought it would be. The color looks like the photo. I will most likely return this unless I can find secret button holes.  Two buttons, zero button holes. The color is good and I would wear this if I could find out how to button it.
This sweater is so warm! Color compliments black leggings or jeans! It’s also super soft and comfortable!
This sweater is cheap, scratchy and ugly
Makes someone look heavy.
Not even close to looking like the picture. If this was an Xxl it’s a junior. I bought bigger than my size .. very disappointing. Much much shorter on the body than shown.
Uggh!  They sent me the orange one!  I ordered the brown one.  So annoyed!!! Other than that it runs small and is cute.

This is very comfortable & the size is accurate! Im.even able to wear a light long sleeve tee under it for added warmth. I haven't washed it yet, but obviously it'll be a hand wash item & lay flat to dry.
The tassels were way too long so I cut them down to about an inch. I just love it now.
My recipient was thrilled with the sweater! Said the knit was soft. Color was good. Idea of the cross-over panel is great!
I got this as a Christmas present for my wife. She loved it! Well-made and good looking.
This is the surprise purchase, fits perfectly, washes easily, color is great.  Received many, many compliments every time I wear it!
Cozy warm and lovely colors!

评论概述: It’s soft and warm, but not good for cat people
评论详情: The pros:  The sweater is warm, soft, and attractive.  The color matches the description, and it is true to size. I wanted to be able to wear a cotton or thermal tee underneath, so I sized up to a medium and am happy with the fit.  You need to have a layer underneath, as there’s only one button, just fyi.  It is lightweight and very soft with no itchiness.  It’s decent quality for the price.The cons:  The open weave knit catches extremely easily on anything.  My cat sat on my lap for a bit, and his claws caught in the fabric multiple times.  At one point, he caused a huge run in the stitches.  Fortunately most of the little snags could be pulled through to the underside and aren’t visible, but the run in stitches is pretty obvious.  The fringe, which is thankfully not overly dramatic, hides some of it.I do love the look and feel of the sweater, but I can’t recommend it to anyone with a cat or any pet with claws.

I bought this as a fall sweater for work. I’m very pleased with the colors, style, weight, and versatility. Throughout the day I have found myself changing the style up based on my mood. I get a lot of compliments on it and plan on buying a second.

评论概述: it is too big.  it said by medium now have exchange for small
评论详情: runs big
Difficult to get the right fit. Torn around the hole for the button. Took forever to be delivered. Why pay for prime shipping!

Very disappointed the product description multicolored the picture and it doesn’t match. Multicolored means much colors more than one color. Mine comes orange and gray. I guess that’s two colors but not what I expected. They need to be honest with their product.

评论概述: Not quite as pictured but super cute
评论详情: The colors are not nearly as muted or earthy as the photo shows. I was a little put off by that at first but the style is so cute, I decided to keep it. It is warm and soft and easy to dress with all sorts of pants or shorts.
Very cheap, doesn’t hang right. Color good, soft,
I gave it a 2 stars because it hangs totally different than on the model.  It looked tacky on me.  Also, the fabric was scratchy.  I returned it.
Felt cheaply made, not flattering

I like the sweater.  It's a little confusing at first to figure out how to button, but it is flattering to wear and comfortable.  I'm a little concerned how it will wash up, and that the tassels might get all messed up, but I guess I'll cross that bridge when I come to it
And it seemed like fabric, not truly knitted.  It felt cheap,  very lightweight.
The color was nice and material soft. The sleeves were a little short for my liking and when button The collar shape is a little weird, more squared then falling in a V.

评论概述: It is very flimsy and unflattering
评论详情: It really is not a decent quality item and it does not drape properly,.The overall pattern and colors are nice enough, but it just doesn'r drape well at all and the material is very inferior,,Even at the discounted price, it was not worth keeping because I would not wear it,
I loved this but it was very thin and I definitely needed a xxl, I went with xl my usual size. But seemed tight, I returned it because it wasn’t thick , but very thin material. Loved the color tho

If you're thinking of purchasing this sweater, you should consider your body size and shape compared to the model. I am not tall, but I'm slender and this sweater doesn't drape in a flattering way when buttoned. I struggled to get the neckline arranged in the way it was pictured. I gave up and wear it hanging open. For those having trouble finding the button holes they are located at both front lower edges. I ended up removing the buttons. The back is much shorter than expected, which is a rather dated style. It would have been much better to have the back longer than the front. There is simply too much sweater in the front to drape nicely. Its not a sweater that you can layer underneath except for a tank top or thin, sleeveless top. Quality is an issue. I've worn it a few times and already it's raveling at back shoulder seams. This sweater could be great with tweaks to its design. I'll keep it for a house wrap but I cannot recommend it otherwise.
I'm a m/l 5ft6in 160 pounds I found this to be tight across the upper back and shorter then pictured.

This was supposed to be color striped (new) and it looks NOTHING like the picture. It's so ugly. Frumpy shape-too big, did not look good. Many people complained they couldn't find button holes, how to button it, that wasn't a problem at all for me-only positive.

This is a really pretty and warm top. It takes a minute to find the button holes, and they are kind of flimsy. I plan on not unbuttoning it and wearing it as a pullover. Please read the reviews before reading. I went a size up based on reviews and that was a good choice for me.
This is my favorite sweater now...my 2nd one by this seller. As much as I liked the first sweater...this one is SOoo much nicer...prettier...and oh how soft!

I sized up to large from the recommended medium after reading the reviews. Best fit with a tank top under it.  I prefer it belted, but buttoned and flowy looks great too. Love the color combination. It’s soft, lightweight and out of the package ready to wear without wrinkles.  I’m definitely going to hand wash so the fringe doesn’t ball up.

评论概述: The color was not in picture
评论详情: I love the fit except sleeves to short and I got a large & im 5’6 165lbs. The only issue was color is not as shown in picture. Brighter orange and mauve colors so I gave it to a friend. But I love the one in picture it’s becoming a hit or miss on Amazon anymore.
Won't wear
I love wearing something different. Like me
Gave this as a gift for a friend of mine and she loves it. It’s comfortable and fits well. You can wear long sleeve shirt with it and not worry about it being too tight.

评论用户: Not worth the money. It snags on everything, the buttons are loose, and it’s already falling apart after wearing it for a few hours.
评论详情: The sweater snags on everything, the buttons are loose, and it is already falling apart after a few hours of wear. Poorly made.

评论概述: Color is totally off, it's not just lighting. Refused to refund.
评论详情: read the other reviews - many complain of the same thing. The color is a bright orange, not nice autumn shades. Refund was refused, attempted to gaslight me telling me it's normal for colors to be a little "off." The colors are completely different! Not just slightly "off."

I purchased this sweater as a birthday gift for my wife, hoping it would be a special surprise. Unfortunately, it arrived just one day before her birthday, leaving no time for a replacement, and the experience has been disappointing. While the Amazon packaging was fine, the inner package arrived damaged, and the sweater itself showed signs of poor quality, with fraying and loose threads in multiple areas. Customer service offered to send a replacement, but it wouldn’t arrive in time, leaving me scrambling to find a last-minute alternative and deal with the inconvenience of returning this one. I was really hopeful about this gift, and I’m genuinely disappointed. I’d appreciate any assistance to help make this right
Cute, cute on. You have to find the button holes to wear it properly. Colors were as pictured for me. I am 5'9" and 145lbs . Fit was asymmetrical and just perfect!'

评论概述: Soft and seams to not shrink when washed
评论详情: Love this. When washed it does not shrink and stay soft. Mine did not come with any weird smell. Has room for a long sleeve shirt to fit comfortably under. I got a medium and it will do nicely for Thanksgiving fullness coverage.
I really love this sweater.  Looked so cute.  Was very warm.  However, had to return it.  It's very scratchy.  I'm so bummed.
Fabric very thin & cheap feeling. Length of item very short, not was is portrayed on photo. Arms too short & very tight, again, not what photo shows. I ordered one size larger than normal.
I love this wrap very much!
Wrong color wanted the colors on the model too short too small ugly colors cheap material too way too long to get here

This is not what is pictured. The shawl is very short and doesn't drape in the front to the legnth that is shown in the picture. I'm 5'1" so for me to say it is short means its pretty short. It also doesn't drape like presented in the picture. I'm medium built with bust at 35 and the medium was very narrow in the shoulder seam - a big disappointment.
The material is a thin, cheap yarn. The cowel neck lays weird, which makes sense why the model was holding it in the picture. Overall not what I imagined.

Love the color, but not sure why there is a button on each side with no button holes. Really Confusing on how this works other than just a wrap. But what are the Buttons For with No Holes ??? I bought this as a Birthday gift but would be embarrassed to give it as not sure how it works ?  So Unfortunately I will be returning this sweater not worth the price with no button holes !!
Cute sweater, I sized down but still plenty big. I ordered the color Striped, the color is not even close to the picture, that is why only 3 stars.
at’s my fault but that being said I still would not purchase this product again!
while there were 2 buttons on this, there were NO button holes for them . . cheap!
This sweater is so unique, with an ethic vibe & very .cute

评论用户: Love it. Sturdy I’m sure this will last a very long time.
评论详情: The sweater was much lighter than what I was expecting. It didn’t quite fit well around the neck. It just wasn’t what I was expecting based on the photo.

I like sleeves to reach my knuckles and this one fell short but it’s at my wrists. The coffee color is a little dull and the sweater has a slightly musty smell. Length is good for leggings or jeans. Looks great with a white tank. My temperature fluctuates wildly from freezing cold to burning hot so I love that I can open this up to get some air. Fabric is a bit itchy & scratchy. Overall an ok lightweight sweater that offers versatility. I think the gray would’ve been a better choice for me.
This sweater runs a tad small but not enough to return it. I couldn't find the button hole for the inside button but just improvised. It's a neat look or I wouldn't have kept it. Color is accurate
I’m 5’ 7 and got a medium.  The length of the sleeves stop right above my wrist.  Otherwise it’s very stylish.
These are so cute and comfortable, it makes you wish for cooler weather so you can wear them. I like them so much I got 3 different colors. 👍👍
I get lots of compliments when I wear this. It’s very comfortable and has a great look to it.

评论概述: Did not get the color I ordered
评论详情: Im bummed I didn't get the color I ordered. Some might not care but I specifically ordered the one with black stripes to make sure it went with some of my shirt colors.  NO black at all in the one i recieved. I like the sweater and fit, and its a pain to return it and try ordering the right one again. Its getting cold so i need it. Why cant you have a resonable ecpectation to just get what you buy!? Disappointed in Seattle.
Very soft and comfy. Looks like the pics.

Disappointed. It is too tight. I wanted to wear over sweater, but was too tight and showed it even more due to striped pattern. Pretty colors, but I didn't really love it in person. The feel of it is so-so.
This color and the length of this sweater is absolutely NOT what reflects in the photos! Returning immediately, cheaply made and cheap material.
Love the fit. Get lots of compliments when I wear it. Color is not exactly what the photo showed, but I do love it💕

Since it had that new smell to it when I opened packed , I gambled and washed it.  No instructions, but I already knew, cold water, delicate.  Lay it flat to dry.  Came out perfect and smelled so good.The knit is really soft.  Fits perfect.5’4. 140 lbs.  MGreat buy.
I was worried this gorgeous sweater would look good only on thinner bodies, but I don't look like the photo model and it still looks good!

Terrible experience returning a poorly made sweater! I sent it back on 8/15 and still am waiting on a refund,on 10/15. They keep pushing my refund date out. Will not be buying anything from them again.

评论概述: Busted seam within hour of wearing
评论详情: Was so excited to order and receive this sweater. I rarely justify spending money on myself so I was hesitant. Regardless, I was hopeful in this sweater to be great so I could order it in other colors. Unfortunately within the hour of wearing the sweater (unwashed) the sleeve busted a seam. Otherwise a great thickness and fit. Just really upset about already having to sew/fix this purchased item
This is such a stylish piece it goes so well with leggings, jeans and it's quite warm and cozy.

Colors are more muted than pics indicate. Fits well, sleeves aren't too long which is nice for shorter wearers, but it barely touches my hips. All the pictures show it past the butt, which is why I bought it. I'm 5'2, it's very unusual for clothing to be too short. I really like the swag/cowl neck option but it sits strangely on my larger chest as it's a lot of fabric piled up, it'll take some finessing. Overall I think I'm keeping it but am still on the hunt for a similar style that actually goes past the hips.

I almost gave it one star, but gave it two because the style is very cute. I bought this sweater for a trip to a location with much cooler weather. With the first wear the button hole and surrounding threads unraveled making the whole enormous. I had to do a quick fix on the street, using a pair of tweezers and tying knots to hold it together, ultimately, I was forced to buy a sweater on vacation because I couldn’t continue to wear this one by the end of the first night even the internal button hole was coming apart. Sadly, I’m returning this sweater.

It's a cute fall sweater however I did not receive the color I thought I ordered. I was expecting what was in the picture that had the orange shades and black stripes. What I got was a completely different shade of colors. I ordered it with a black pair of jeans expecting to where with it but I ended up being sorely disappointed. I will be returning will never order from this seller. I would love to exchange for the correct color but I'm not taking that chance. I would not recommend!!!!!!

I like this sweater but it's much thinner than any other sweater I've ever owned. The sleeves are shorter than I like but I have long arms so it's probably just right for most people. Overall it's comfortable and easy to wear. It definitely needs an under layer.

My original review was rejected. That tells you something. This sweater is not as pictured. There are two buttons, one on each side. No button holes. Essentially it's a cardigan not a sweater. It looks ridiculous as a cardigan because the fringe is then only on one side. I only kept it because I sew, and I took some time to sew it to make it an actual sweater. It was worth more for me to keep and fix vs the hassle of returning. Otherwise, color was as described and it is comfortable.
I love the way it feels and fits
You cannot button one side to the other like the picture.  There are no holes unless you rip through the seams!!
Beautiful

评论概述: So soft and true to size
评论详情: I love everything about this sweater.  Soft. And fits so nice.

评论概述: Nice quality for the price ... just as described!
评论详情: I'm a senior 5'5" 144 lbs. and ordered my usual size L in light gray as I have broad shoulders & wear a bra size 38C. The sweater was just as described. Did not disappoint in any way. Because the knit is medium weight, care may be required to maintain the stability of the buttons & holes though I'm not too concerned. BTW, I didn't have trouble figuring out how to button it properly on my body. I was hoping it would provide a slimming effect as stated and it does...yeah!  Good value for the price.

I was super excited to get this sweater today, after several weeks of contemplating buying it. The one good thing I can say about it is that it’s soft and feels like it should be the perfect weight for fall.  With the said, that was the only positive thing I can say… Unfortunately, the color was way off from what is shown in the photos. Instead of being pretty, dark shades of burnt orange, browns, black and dark grey, it’s actually a bright pumpkin orange, a blue color and army green. The pattern isnt even remotely the same. I had to double check that I was even sent the correct sweater because it look anything like the one shown.  The cut isn’t even close either. I ordered it in large, which is the size the Amazon recommended for me. I expected it to be more narrow through the body, tight fitting sleeves and longer length, what i received is very wide through the body, with really baggy, almost puffy sleeves that are way too short and the length is super short. I’m 5’6, long legs and shorter torso, so when something is supposed to be longer, it almost always fits me as it’s shown to. The total length from the shoulder to the very bottom of the sweater is almost 21”, not the 31” that was stated in the size description. The whole sweater is very short and boxy and not at all flattering. Needless to say, it’s going back asap because unless I was shaped like Humpty Dumpty, this is not going to work at all. Bummer 😥
Based on some of the reviews I went a size bigger.  I'm glad I did, fits like the photo. Color is beautiful earth tones.
Picture was much nicer than product. I ordered a medium but it fit more like a small and the sleeves were short. Fabric was very thin, and scratchy and poor quality.
Does not fit write
Not super (like petting a bunny) soft but it’s awesome!  Will be getting another one in a different color!

So disappointed!  I ordered in a 2XL because I wanted to make sure it was loose and cozy like on the model... Well it might as well be a medium, maybe a small. The model pictured must be an extra small wearing a 3XL because this thing might as well be a hand towel its so small! The sleeves dont even go down to my wrists and its just tiny in general. Wrap it up along my shoulder as pictured? Forget it. It barely closes. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME unless you are petite then SIZE way UP!
Material looks a little cheap, but I kept it because it still looks nice and stylish.

The design is amazing and each time I wore it I received compliments. I’m 5’8’’ and about 155lbs. I have slightly longer arms so I sized up to an extra large to accommodate. It did not help, and the shoulder seems were low on my and weird on my upper arms, the middle hung open  and the sleeves were still kinda short on my wrists.  If you have shorter arms it is true to size.
I read all the reviews and I crossed my fingers. I was very happy that it I’d just as pictured and I love it. Come on Fall!!!
I am 5'9" - the model must be 5" even.  The sweater runs VERY small and short.  I do not recommend it.
I should have gotten the medium but I still love it! Very soft material, very comfortable.
This is so comfortable and hip looking! I get so many compliments.
The design is a little awkward around the neck but overall it’s warm and cosy.

I loved the way it looked and I ordered an xtra large and it is fantastic. It looks sharp. I like western/native/boho clothing. It is really nice. Love it. It was a great purchase for me and the sizing was true to size.
Very soft material and comfortable. A lot lighter than I thought it would be and perfect for fall weather.

评论概述: Itchy fabric and not as pictured
评论详情: Despite more negative reviews recently, I decided to take a gamble and order this in black. The sweater I received is more gray with some browns woven in. I could have accepted this but the fabric was incredibly itchy. The photos show a fabric with a sheen that made me think this would be a softer and shimmery knit fabric. It was barely above the feel of a burlap bag.  The fit left a lot to be desired also. I know I'm short (4'10") but have made other longer sweaters still work. This fabric was so stiff I couldn't get it to lay right to give the look in the photo. No matter how much I played with the neckline, the top continued to stiffly gape open much too high up, making it even longer on me.  This will be returned...
